replies.msg:
Section 4 of Limitation Ordinance (Cap.347):
Limitation of actions of contract and tort, and certain other actions
(1)The following actions shall not be brought after the expiration of 6 years from the date on which the cause of action accrued, that is to say—
(a)actions founded on simple contract or on tort;
(b)actions to enforce a recognizance;
(c)actions to enforce an award, where the submission is not by an instrument under seal;
(d)
actions to recover any sum recoverable by virtue of any Ordinance or imperial enactment, other than a penalty or forfeiture or sum by way of penalty or forfeiture:
Provided that—
(i)(Repealed 31 of 1991 s. 4)
(ii)nothing in this subsection shall be taken to refer to any action to which section 6 applies.


貸款合約屬於1(a) simple contract, 過左6年就無得再追
the date on which the cause of action accrued 係呢個情況,通常指你個朋友違約無還錢果日
所以由你朋友無還錢果日開始計6年,過左6年佢就無得再告你追數
